text: nirṇitanāḷukaḷi l niṅṅaḷ daivasmaraṇayil ‎muḻukuka. āreṅkiluṁ dhr̥ti kāṇicc raṇṭudivasaṁ ‎keāṇṭutanne matiyākki maṭaṅṅiyāl, atil ‎teṟṟeānnumilla. āreṅkiluṁ pintimaṭaṅṅunnuveṅkil ‎atiluṁ teṟṟilla. bhaktipularttunnavarkkuḷḷatāṇ ī ‎niyamaṁ. niṅṅaḷ allāhuvēāṭ bhaktiyuḷḷavarāvuka. ‎aṟiyuka: niṅṅaḷellāṁ avanṟe sannidhiyil ‎orumiccu kūṭṭappeṭunnavarāṇ. ‎
